institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 21 (Recovery of Illegal Profits, etc.)
contents: Article 21 (Recovery of Illegal Profits, etc.) ① The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall recover any illegal profits obtained by a participant in the Global Job Project through false or other illegal methods. Revised September 11, 2020, ② The Chairman of the Board of Directors may take measures such as filing criminal charges, imposing additional sanctions, and publishing the list of illegal beneficiaries under Paragraph 1, and specific details shall be determined separately by the Chairman of the Board. Revised 2020. 9. 11.
